scripts.extension: vite build --outDir dist_extension && cp background.js content_script.js ./dist_extension && mkdir ./dist_extension/tictactoe_spiral && cp ./dist_extension/assets/content_script.* ./dist_extension/assets/content_script.js && cp ./dist_extension/assets/App.*.css ./dist_extension/assets/App.css && mv ./dist_extension/assets ./dist_extension/tictactoe_spiral/assets
